title: Does the Samsung Galaxy A53 5G have a microSD card slot?
content:
The Samsung Galaxy A53 offers plenty of value for its price in the US. It’s got an impressive specs sheet that includes a lot of great features including a vibrant display, a big battery, an adequately powerful SoC, and more. But does the Samsung Galaxy A53 have a microSD card slot? Yes, the A53 5G

description: The Samsung Galaxy A53 offers a lot great features for the price. But does it have a microSD card slot? Let's find out in this article.
